Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; part of rosette in added white and added red; exterior, slip worn: part of a pendant roundel as filling ornament; below, trace of possible animal motif.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0418) (phase 2)
